Name: Snakeskin Veil
Description: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can’t be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Name: Disdainful Stroke
Description: Counter target spell with mana value 4 or greater.

Name: Ossification
Description: Enchant basic land you control When Ossification enters, exile target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls until Ossification leaves the battlefield.

Name: Lightning Strike
Description: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.
